item.description:
The run will take place on Sunday, February 3rd, on the corner of Beacon and Gerrett Streets in Greenfield, MA over a snow-packed course to benefit the Paws Park of Greenfield Initiative. In the event of no snow, the event will be rescheduled.

The entry fee is $5 per dog. Cash or check only with checks being made out to "Friends of Greenfield" with Paws Park in the comment field. We ask that you bring a harness and pick up after your dog while at the location. Each dog will be placed in a category of racers in a similar weight category and pull either a can size keg, bubba keg, quarter keg, or half keg. (Kegs are empty of any contents).

Register your dog at https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/viewform?formkey=dGUwQTAxMmNuQ2ZZM3Rmb3F3OVEtaGc6MQ

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Greenfield Winter Carnival K9 Keg Pull
